meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of archaea.
meanings.sent1: The archaeal structures were unique in their design.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study archaeal organisms to learn more about their characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The archaeal party hats were a hit at the science fair.
meanings.sent4: Her love for archaeal history was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The archaeal landscape was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the domain Archaea.
meanings.sent1: The archaeal research focused on understanding their environment.
meanings.sent2: The archaeal community thrived in extreme conditions.
meanings.sent3: The archaeal fashion show featured unique designs inspired by extremophiles.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an archaeal kingdom, full of ancient knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The archaeal ecosystem was a delicate balance of life.

meanings.definition: A member of the domain Archaea.
meanings.sent1: The archaeal was discovered in a hot spring.
meanings.sent2: Scientists classified the new archaeal based on its genetic makeup.
meanings.sent3: The archaeal's dance moves were out of this world.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an archaeal in a sea of bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The archaeal's presence brought a sense of mystery to the lab.
